summary.title: About me
summary.description: I have working experience of 6 months in MAQ Software. Then I joined Infosys as a System Engineer and have been working in Mainframe system since 2018. During which I have improved my skills a lot in analysis, debugging, code-fixes and domain. I am a self-motivated and self-taught professional who likes to solve problems

career.title: Career Objective
career.description: A highly organized and hard-working individual looking for a responsible position to gain <u>practical experience</u> and to make use of my interpersonal skills to achieve goals of a company that focuses on customer satisfaction and customer experience.

companyList.name: Infosys Ltd.
description: Analyze and fix Service Requests based on Business requirements.
Debug code in case of defect and give proper code fix to be installed in production.
Reduced manual effort by designing JCL job that automatically query database to fetch result.
Monitor during implementation and working on Ad-hoc changes if required.
Developing COBOL-DB2 modules and API's/Service based requirements and unit testing and integration testing after development.
Written DB2 query to fetch details from database for various validations and simulations.

companyList.name: MAQ Software
description: Customized Power BI reports using custom visuals Gantt Chart, Bowtie Chart, Linear Gauge, and Horizontal Funnel.
Developed API for Power BI Custom Visuals to convert and download reports in PDF.
Created Data Pipelines in Azure Data Factory.
Added a small feature using Node.js
Added changes in stored procedure using SQL and merged changes to repository.

key_projects.title: Key Projects / Involvements

Involved in "Computerization of Marketing Management" for internship in Skyla Software Solution (P) Ltd.

Virtual Classroom (E-learning) project allowed teached to upload notes and student to access notes using HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP and SQL.
Hostel Mess Managemet System project to manage fees for all students of different department using HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP and SQL.
